CustomField.formula:
IF( TODAY() > EndDate, "Over",
IF( AND(TODAY() >= ServiceDate, OR(TODAY() <= EndDate, ISBLANK(EndDate))), "Active",
IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(EndDate)), EndDate - TODAY() <= $CustomMetadata.Days__mdt.Delta_Days.Delta_Days__c), "Leaving soon",
IF( ServiceDate - TODAY() <= $CustomMetadata.Days__mdt.Delta_Days.Delta_Days__c, "Coming soon",
IF( AND(TODAY() <= ServiceDate, ServiceDate - TODAY() > $CustomMetadata.Days__mdt.Delta_Days.Delta_Days__c), "Incoming",
IF( AND(TODAY() >= ServiceDate, ISBLANK(EndDate)), "Active",
"Status Unknown" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status Order Item
